channel.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
channel.description:
I don't know if I am crazy, but I see a person running, with a white coat :|
[b]Screen: [/b]
[img]https://s2.subirimagenes.com/otros/6408841omg.jpg[/img]
Run this video (do not pause) between 3:29 and 3:32.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wYps-kGPh78[/url]
Ok, what?

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: DrasarSalman
item.description:
Ratman died and the cube escaped trough a tube to then get almost incinerated and thrown out.

Mystery solved!

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
av3nger:

They mean ratman is CARRYING the cube. he would be behind the cube out of sight while running up the stairs.

Or it could be on his back like it is in the comic. That’s what it looks like to me, actually.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Ryλn:

I read the video’s youtube comments, and a countless number of people are saying it’s the Ratman. Lol. It’s obviously the companion cube unless the Ratman is pink and has 6 congruent sides.

Oh and one guy said he noticed a body in the background. He is most likely trolling though. It would be neat if Valve has yet another detail we havent spotted yet that reveals the Ratman’s body, leg shot up too, following the comic.

EDIT: Btw, at 3:38… Is that a potato plant engulfing multiple turrets with its root system? Or is that a patch of Xen Plants/bacteria spreading throughout the room? It looks very odd.

They mean ratman is CARRYING the cube. he would be behind the cube out of sight while running up the stairs.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: genericenemy
item.description:
Well if you look in the background on the right from 4.11 onwards I swear i can see a rattmann like figure in the background.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: theriddlen
item.description:
ManlyStump:

Where did you get that from? “o ciel” doesn’t translate to “Oh Chell”, it means “oh heavens”.

It’s a pun. Ciel sounds similar to Chell.

He probably got it from there:
https://sebastianwolff.info/news/2011/04/turret-opera-cara-mia-a-cappella/

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
Maverix26:

If anyone wants to take a look at the turret song lyrics (Because they’re actually singing with words)
Cara bella, cara mia bella!
Mia bambina, o ciel!
Ché la stimo…
Ché la stimo.
O cara mia, addio!
La mia bambina cara,
perché non passi lontana?
Sì, lontana da Scïenza, [personified]
Cara, cara mia bambina?
Ah, mia bella!
Ah, mia cara!
Ah, mia cara!
Ah, mia bambina!
O cara, cara mia…

Now in English:
Dear beautiful, my beautiful darling!
My child, oh Chell!
For I hold her in esteem…
For I hold her in esteem.
Farewell to my dear!
My dear girl,
why do you not walk away?
Yes, away from Science,
My dear, my dear girl?
Ah, my beautiful!
Ah, my dear!
Ah, my dear!
Ah, my child!
Oh dear, my dear…

Damn valve are insane.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
It’s funny how different people see different things. My friend and I both decided to do the single game before going co-op. I was only a map ahead of him and mentioned how I happened to see P-Body going out and in a door off a catwalk. He never saw P-Body and was looking for him in that map. I couldn’t even guess how many times you’d have to play Portal 2 to see everything! That, alone, would be an achievement.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
Chell is a name, it wouldn’t be translated. Where’s your source?

And to clarify: I don’t think Rossini wrote this to be directed to a girl named Chell!

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
It is definite “Oh Chell”.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: Ry_amp_955_n
item.description:
sersoft:

I guess we know why Valve used motion pictures for that sequence instead of the in-game world, because then anyone could noclip through the area and see the animations from a better angle.

I know. I noclipped everywhere in the last few maps to see if i could find anything neat. Nothing. Although I love the end sequence, it makes me frustrated because yeah, what you said.

EDIT: Oh, and nice find, Maverix. I never would have known that. Valve is fucking insane. lol.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: orange_cat
item.description:
This definitely a companion cube, but it appears to be one of the newer glowing ones.

1280×720 242 KB

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: SkyBlue
item.description:
Did anyone else notice the smiley face in the elevator tubes? Literally as soon as the level loads, on the section between the blackness and when you start seeing stuff outside the tube.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: HawkeyE
item.description:
While it’s definitely the companion cube, I didn’t notice it before this thread. Valve is awesomely nuts. So much ridiculous detail that is barely noticeable but awesome if and when you do notice it.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
Yeah it’s the companion cube. At first I thought it was a guy too but after looking at it, it’s definitely the companion cube. I especially know it is because it keeps going up the stairs and following the elevator behind the glass as you keep going up, then at the end it lands right behind you.

Read full topic

item.title: End Portal 2, a person running?!
item.dc:creator: King_Kaddo
item.description:
It’s the companion cube you m****.
